author: Tetila, E. C. et al.
research gap: studies using UAV images for soybean disease detection in real field conditions
dataset: Phantom 3 Professional UA V, Sony EXMOR sensor

author: Lay, L. et al.
objective: assess the feasibility of employing HSI to detect bacterial wildfire infection in soybean leaves, determine the precise dates of disease symptom detection, and select efficient wavelengths for the early differentiation of healthy and diseased plants.
research gap: approaches for early detection of bacterial wildfire in soybean leaves.
